# Welcome! {-}

Welcome to the SDMX Constructor User Manual! SDMX Constructor is a powerful software tool that allows users to model data as per SDMX standards, generate and edit SDMX artefacts, and support data availability and access through online data portals.

This user manual provides step-by-step instructions on how to use SDMX Constructor. The manual is designed to be user-friendly and accessible for various technical professionals, including data portal managers, database managers, IT infrastructure managers, developers, and statisticians. This manual provides an in-depth understanding of SDMX Constructor's features and functionality and is an essential resource for anyone managing and sharing data.
